title: Low Priority Queue Timer Currently Broken

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body: At the moment I have noticed that Low Priority Queue timer will randomly reset itself, I've seen it happen a few times over the past week. I'm not sure if this problem is only happening to me, but during random times in low priority queue the timer will reset itself back to 20 minutes. If there is a fix for this or if it is happening to anyone else, I would love to know about it, thanks.

replies.body: I have noticed this multiple times as well - notably every time my computer goes to sleep or if I log into another windows account leaving this one logged in - but sometimes also just completely randomly. Even right now I'm noticing the timer going down at a slower rate than it should be (for example I've been finding a match for 11 minutes and it says that I have 14 minutes left). Haven't seen this before and I don't know about any fix...
